description: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.
A good, high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a standard Poké Ball.
An ultra-high performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a Great Ball.
A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes a wild Pokémon more friendly toward you immediately after it's caught.
A particularly comfortable Poké Ball that makes a wild Pokémon quickly grow friendlier after being caught.
A remedial Poké Ball that restores HP and eliminates status conditions for a Pokémon caught with it.
The very best Poké Ball with the ultimate level of performance. With it, you will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.
A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when catching Pokémon that are usually very quick to run away.
A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when catching Pokémon in or on the water.
A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when catching Water- or Bug-type Pokémon.
A somewhat rare Poké Ball made to commemorate a special occasion of some sort.
A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective at catching Pokémon when used first thing in a battle.
